domain_terms.Development Stack: Set of technologies, frameworks, and tools used to build software
domain_terms.Dependency Management: Process of managing external libraries and their versions
domain_terms.Build Pipeline: Automated sequence of steps to compile, test, and package code
domain_terms.Code Quality: Measure of software maintainability, readability, and adherence to standards
domain_terms.Version Control: System for tracking changes to source code over time
domain_terms.Development Environment: Local or cloud-based workspace for writing and testing code
domain_terms.Artifact Repository: Storage system for compiled binaries and packages

framework_description: development stack, build pipelines, dependency management, code quality, and artifact management
